alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Kenton; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:30AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF KENTON, CAMPBELL AND NORTHERN PENDLETON COUNTIES THROUGH 700 AM EDT... At 630 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Independence, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Independence, Erlanger, Alexandria, Taylor Mill, Walton, Claryville, Cold Spring, Ryland Heights, Mentor, Moscow, Fairview, California, Visalia, Atwood, Grants Lick, Gubser Mill, Peach Grove, White Villa and Ivor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
